attributes.action: Rethink the idea of a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not feel Mrs Thatcher should have the state funeral because during her time in office she was paid to do a job the same as many thousands of ordinary people. Sir Winston Churchill pulled the British people through a World War and was a strong leader. Mrs Thatcher closed down mines, created the poll tax, very cleverly sold on council houses forcing the working man to be tied and less likely to strike.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
